# Sigils of Suppression, Lesser (WondArch)
## Overview
**Sigils of Suppression, Lesser:** These are identical to the *[[Sigils of Suppression (WondArch)|sigils of suppression]]*, except that they only block spell effects of 3rd level or lower (as per *[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|lesser globe of invulnerability]]*).

*Caster Level:* 7th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|lesser globe of invulnerability]]**; Market Price:* 14,000 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 83
